description:
Linux Mint distribution is getting a Night Light feature for the Cinnamon desktop environment and support for Framework laptops.

The post Linux Mint Is Getting a Night Light Feature in Cinnamon, Framework Laptop Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Linux Mint Is Getting a Night Light Feature in Cinnamon, Framework Laptop Support
